name: Bulldoze
description: You strike the ground so hard that it ripples out from you in a 30 foot circle. Any creature caught in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 1d10 + MOVE ground damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Raised creatures are immune to the effects and damage of this move.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
